ada paksha dekak wisin palanaya karanawa, eeth ekkenek wath thirana ganne naha.” 1948 rupika nidahase patan ejapaya ha shrilanipaya wisin nayakathwaya dun anupraptha aandu, wadakarana janayage prajathanthrawadi abhilashayan ha dawena samaja awashyatha aamanthranaya kirimata dhaneshwarayata pawathina no hakiyawa mana lesa pradarshanaya kara atha.
